page.title: 16The Survey And Leisure
page.content:
This and the following pages are a very brief outline of the answers given by 312 local families, to a questionnaire sent out via the children of Gt. Totham Primary School. ______________________________________ Main Holidays are taken as follows:
British Isles............92 families Europe..................137 families Beyond Europe............11 families No major holiday.........72 families ______________________________________ Use Of Major Local Leisure Centres:
Bramston Sports Centre..104 families Friary Youth And Adult.. 28 families Tiptree Sports Centre... 2 families Oakwood Arts Centre..... 22 families Plume Sports Hall....... 4 families Foresters Golf Club..... 10 families
